description:
Ikazuchi tries to pacify O-Yamigedo while the Omni Lords seal the creature. Although Gratos is gone, O-Yamigedo absorbs his powers and begins to control the Inverse Fiends, as well as Ikazuchi. Gao engages in a desperate Buddyfight to save him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 超決戦! 超渋谷大崩壊!!
